group_1.narration: This was my first time holding a New Year's@party, but thanks to my special cooking and@the girls helping out, it went swimmingly!

group_1.textCenter: (I'm so glad I gave it a whirl!)
Time to turn in now, I guess!

group_1.textRight: Are you still here, Mitama?

group_1.textLeft: Kanagi! You came!

group_1.textRight: Yes. But my shift starts soon. I stopped by@to see how things are.
Let me help you clean up what's left of@your party.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you for the offer!
But there's really not that much left.

group_1.textRight: Hm, is that so?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. Everyone lent a hand today.

group_1.textRight: Was it a success?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, it was phenomenal!
[chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]My New Year's food and the soup were a hit♪

group_1.textRight: [chara:101601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Really?!
Well... I'm glad to hear it, I guess.

group_1.textLeft: Everyone enjoyed it so much I'm already@aching to do it again next year!
Oh, right!
The party today sparked a new aspiration.
[chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I want to do my best at cooking...@That's my big dream!

group_1.textRight: Cooking, huh...

group_1.textLeft: Mmhmm.
Cooking is a great way to make lots of@people happy at once, you know?

group_1.textRight: Hm. You're right. I get that feeling a lot at@work.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* I knew it!
I want to make everyone even happier with@my cooking!
[chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]And then keep getting better and better, so@everyone showers me with praise♪
So I'll keep on trying lots of cooking from@now on!

group_1.textRight: Yes, well, you can't hope to change if you@never push yourself.

group_1.textLeft: I was thinking of trying to cook a rice@omelet as my first challenge!

group_1.textRight: I don't want to rain on your parade or@anything.
But I beg of you...

group_1.textLeft: Hm?

group_1.textRight: When you're cooking, please use ingredients@fit for human consumption.

group_1.textLeft: Oh my, of course I will!

group_1.textRight: Anyway, I need to be going now.

group_1.textLeft: All right. Good luck at work.

group_1.textRight: Mhm.
Mitama!

group_1.textLeft: Why are you here alone? Where are Yachiyo@and the others?

group_1.textRight: Oh, um, they went on ahead to Mizuna Shrine@without me.
I came back...to come get you!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: I wanted to ask you at the party...
But with everything going on, I just didn't@get the chance.
I was wondering if you'd like to come@take a photo with us?

group_1.textLeft: With all of you?

group_1.textRight: Yes!
You're wearing a kimono too.
We don't get many chances to take a photo@all dressed up together!
So would you come take one with us? Please?

group_1.narration: I'm blessed in my own way.@With kind, caring, and strong friends@who I treasure, and that care about me.
I really couldn't hope for more.
I don't know any other people@that are as kind as these girls.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, let me see...

group_1.textRight: Huh?
Please! Let's go together!

group_1.textLeft: (Mizuna Shrine, huh?)
Well, okay.
Oh, but wait, I couldn't possibly. Could I?

group_1.textRight: M-Mitama!
